alert.note: Alert for Bedford; Blair; Fulton; Huntingdon; Mifflin; Southern Centre; Southern Clinton (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Freeze Watch issued April 24 at 3:14AM EDT until April 25 at 8:00AM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: ...FROST ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM EDT THIS MORNING... ...FREEZE WATCH IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT THROUGH TUESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...For the Frost Advisory, temperatures as low as 30 will result in frost formation. For the Freeze Watch, sub-freezing temperatures as low as 29 possible. * WHERE...Southern Centre, Blair, Huntingdon, Mifflin, Bedford, Fulton and Southern Clinton Counties. * WHEN...For the Frost Advisory, until 8 AM EDT this morning. For the Freeze Watch, from late tonight through Tuesday morning. * IMPACTS...Freezing temperatures could kill crops and other sensitive vegetation. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Rural valley locations will experience the coldest temperatures.
info.instruction: Take protective measures now as freezing temperatures could damage or kill tender plants and vegetation. Potted plants should be brought inside. The latest forecast information can be found on the NWS State College Facebook page and Twitter @NWSStateCollege, or on the web at weather.gov/ctp.
